item.title: CVE-2023-0829|2023-09-20T12:38:54.973Z -- plesk -- plesk
item.description: Plesk 17.0 through 18.0.31 version, is vulnerable to a Cross-Site Scripting. A malicious subscription owner (either a customer or an additional user), can fully compromise the server if an administrator visits a certain page in Plesk related to the malicious subscription.
